interviews.headline: While other boys in his class were reading Shoot! Nigel subscribed to Cordon Bleu magazine
interviews.standfirst: A loveless childhood drove Nigel Slater, The Observer's food writer, to seek affection elsewhere - in the kitchen. In a rare interview to coincide with the publication of his revealing autobiography, he tells Tim Adams how he found escape and happiness in his passion for food, cooking and the washing-up
